title: Black Screen after champion select
body:
Has anyone found a fix for this? i have tried all the compatibility/firewall/antivirus reinstall etc.

I just started this game and i have never played a game with this many issues since floppy disk days? 

thanks

replies.body:
Hey j3yyy,

Sounds like your computer is having a hard time connecting to your Client. You should give Riots Connection KB a try and see if that fixes your black screen issue. 

Connection KB: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues

Hope this helps.
